pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhuñjamānā sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:7.1: “Na bhuñjamāno sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:8.1: Na bhuñjamānena sabbo hattho mukhe pakkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca bhuñjamāno sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
